overview: Windfall of Grace is a humble tribute to the great Neem Karoli Baba (1900-1973), who is a marvelous metaphor of the exalted beings that India is treasured for. The film explores the enigma that Maharajji (as he is popularly known) was and continues to be, as it journeys across places saturated in his aura, meeting people who inexorably emanate his fragrance, and in this way hopes to facilitate his darshan: an experience of his loving presence.  Director: Japna Tulsi; Recipient of the Outstanding Achievement Award (Debut Filmmaker), Druk International Film Festival, Bhutan 2020; Best Documentary Film, Indus Valley International Film Festival 2020; Award of Recognition, Impact Docs Award, USA 2020; among others.  Available for free viewing on https://windfallofgrace.com/watch-film
tagline: A Heart-invoking Odyssey on the Spiritual Pied Piper Neem Karoli Baba.
title: Windfall Of Grace
